author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7 Place the cream in a saucepan over a medium heat, and, when warm, add the potato and leeks and bring to a simmer for 3-4 minutes.  Remove the cream mixture from the heat and allow to cool for a few minutes. Gradually add the egg yolks and cheese, whisking constantly until all the cheese has melted.  Add the salmon and pour into an ovenproof dish. Top with extra cheese and place into the oven to bake for ten minutes, or until golden and cooked through. To serve, place the chives on top of the dish.
ingredients: 142ml/5fl oz double cream,  Â½ potato, chopped ,  55g/2oz leek, chopped,  55g/2oz cheddar cheese, grated, plus extra for sprinkling,  2 free-range egg yolks, beaten,  55g/2oz salmon, skin removed, chopped,  fresh chives, trimmed
